definition: -ly/structural particle: used before a verb or adjective, linking it to preceding modifying adverbial adjunct

sentences.english: A graben creates a favourable setting for uranium deposition .
sentences.chinese: 地塹成爲鈾礦沉積的有利部位。

sentences.english: Between graben are relatively high-standing blocks called horsts.
sentences.chinese: 介於地塹之間的是較高位的斷塊，稱爲地壘。

sentences.english: The Fuxin basin is a late Mesozoic NNE-trending graben coal-bearing basin.
sentences.chinese: 阜新盆地屬於晚中生代NNE向地塹式煤盆地。

sentences.english: The Shanxi graben system is one of the important specific morphotectonic types in the eastern part of China.
sentences.chinese: 山西地塹系是中國東部重要獨特構造地貌類型之一。

sentences.english: A graben creates a favourable setting for uranium deposition.
sentences.chinese: 地塹成爲鈾礦沉積的有利部位。

sentences.english: Cenozoic graben structure is the most general and characteristic tectonic in North China.
sentences.chinese: 新生代地塹構造是華北地區最普遍和最有特徵的構造。
